title: How to View Source Code in Firefox

steps.headline: Browse to the website you'd like to view the source code for.
Right-click anywhere on the page, except on any text, graphics, or links.
Click "View Page Source" to view the source code for the page.

tyn: Computer with a mouse and keyboard
text: Open up Firefox.  Browse to the website you'd like to view the source code for.  Right-click anywhere on the page, except on any text, graphics, or links.  Click "View Page Source" to view the source code for the page.
sentences: Browse to the website you'd like to view the source code for.
Right-click anywhere on the page, except on any text, graphics, or links.
Click "View Page Source" to view the source code for the page.
